Articles.Content:
This is a great alien evolution community I am part of. In it, you make evolutions of creatures every generation. In the next generation, you can then evolve your evolution from the past generation, so on, so on.

Forum Link: http://sagan4.com/forum/index.php
I watch this since years. You are part of it? What creatures did you invent?

I watch this since years. You are part of it? What creatures did you invent?

Some Gen 152 and Gen 153 creatures. A Slaesosaurus evo, a Scylarian, and some miniswamers. Also some Mason life (Red Smoolks).
I do some similar stuff maybe i should participate.
